source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.
source_objects.title: Food & Beverage

items.title: Cold Brew Coffee - Hot and Cold Healthy Drinks
items.headline: Learn how to make better coffee and all about coffee!
objectives_summary: You will learn how to pick the best coffee beans
You will know where to order fresh coffee from
You will learn how to save time and money

items.title: Sourdough Bread & Starter No Fail Recipe Easy To Understand
items.headline: This is a broken down & decoded full length recipe tutorial on how to make an amazing authentic loaf of sourdough bread!
objectives_summary: You will be able to bake one of the most delicious loaves of sourdough bread you have ever tasted! This recipe was created for SIMPLICITY & FLAVOR!!! After finishing this course you will understand the basic concepts of sourdough and what is happening during the sourdough making process! You will also be able to maintain a simple sourdough baking schedule, whether it be daily, weekly, or even monthly loaves of bread! You will be able to use your starter whenever you want then store it away for as long as you need! After completing this course you will be able to venture off into SO MANY OTHER BREADS and a whole new world of bread baking will open up for you!

items.title: Create 40+ Tasty Raw Food Recipes with Chef LaFaye Pye

visible_instructors.title: LaFaye Pye
visible_instructors.name: LaFaye
visible_instructors.job_title: Creator and owner of the Raw Food Pantry

items.headline: Need to eat more fruits and veggies? But think it's going to be tasteless and boring? Here's 40+ Recipes to tempt you.
objectives_summary: "Create 40 delicious gourmet raw food recipes"
Learn how to make simple and healthy snacks
Learn how to create wonderful hydrating drinks

items.title: Perfect Potluck Vegan Salads

visible_instructors.title: Michelle Johnson
visible_instructors.name: Michelle
visible_instructors.job_title: Producer at Vegan Cooking with Love

items.headline: Learn how to make salads that are more than just lettuce and vegetables, that will impress your friends and family.
objectives_summary: Take simple ingredients and turn them into satisfying, colorful salads
Make flavorful versatile dressings
Make vegan versions of salads and dressings that are traditionally made with egg-based mayonnaise

items.title: Easy, Healthy Sweets and Desserts: Cooking Lessons for Dad
items.headline: Learn How to Make Healthy and Healthier Delicious Sweets, Treats, and Desserts! Cook Amazingly Delicious Sweet Recipes!
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to cook many delicious, healthy desserts and sweet treats!
By the end of this course, you will understand a variety of ways to make healthier sweet recipes!
You will learn how to adjust the ingredients to make recipes healthier and still taste good!

items.title: Gluten Free Vegan and Plant  Based  Cooking,The Basics
items.headline: A course for students to learn basic plant based recipes which are also gluten free, dairy, fish meat and egg free.
objectives_summary: Easy Vegan and   Gluten Free Vegan Cooking. Learn about equipment, how to chop, prepare gluten free grains and make basic vegan meals dessert and simple bread.

items.title: How to Make New York City Pizza at Home

visible_instructors.title: Jeff Petersmeyer
visible_instructors.name: Jeff
visible_instructors.job_title: A track coach with a pizza addiction

items.headline: Learn how to make great pizza in your own oven
objectives_summary: How to make NYC pizza dough and sauce from scratch
How to bake pizza properly
Students will learn the equipment, ingredients, and recipes necessary to make NYC pizza at home

items.title: Cook 3 Moroccan Tagine Recipes Easily!
items.headline: A Tagine Masterclass of 3 Recipes
objectives_summary: You will be able to cook 3 delicious tagines successfully at home: a Chicken Tagine, a Fish Tagine and a Vegan Tagine.
You will learn how to cook couscous at home without a traditional steamer, and how to use it in other recipes, not just with tagines.
You will learn how to season and care for your tagines, glazed and unglazed.

items.title: Cook Delicious Low Sodium Mexican Food!

visible_instructors.title: Judy Craft
visible_instructors.name: Judy
visible_instructors.job_title: Low Sodium Expert - Homemaker, Cook, Shopper, Planner

items.headline: Make Heart Healthy Mexican Food Meals | Low-Sodium Mexican Enchiladas, Dips, Green Chili, Mexican Rice, and more!
objectives_summary: Make Low Sodium Mexican Food Meals Your Entire Family Will Love!
Low-Sodium Mexican Food Is Not Bland!
Prepare Heart Healthy Mexican Food Meals

items.title: Advanced Liquor Knowledge
items.headline: An in depth look at the various families of liquor, beer and wine
objectives_summary: Bartending and Liquor Knowledge

items.title: Wine Lover online course
items.headline: The complete wine course for beginners. Grape varieties and countries.
objectives_summary: How to taste, drink and store wine correctly.
How to read wine labels from different countries.
How to choose good wine.

visible_instructors.job_title: ベストセラー講師, 2万人以上の受講生

items.headline: Learn many dishes you can make using miso other than miso soup!
objectives_summary: Cook and prepare several dishes using miso
Enjoy easy, healthy and delicious Japanese food at home
Prepare healthier but delicious meals for the whole family

items.title: Making Country Wines

visible_instructors.title: Alister Christie
visible_instructors.name: Alister
visible_instructors.job_title: Software developer, farmer, home brewing educator.

items.headline: Make delicious fruit wines in your own kitchen
objectives_summary: Make your own wine from a variety of fruits and berries

items.title: Basics of Buttercream
items.headline: Everything you need to know about making, flavouring, colouring, storing, and using BUTTERCREAM!
objectives_summary: Everything you need to know to make and use buttercream!
How to make buttercream frosting with the perfect consistency
How to troubleshoot any issues (yellow buttercream, graininess, lumps, air bubbles, too sweet, melting)

items.title: Cider to the World

visible_instructors.title: Andrew Byers
visible_instructors.name: Andrew
visible_instructors.job_title: Duke of Tanks / Production Cider Manager

items.headline: Communicate with confidence about the fastest growing adult beverage in America
objectives_summary: critically assess the qualities of cider in the glass and cider in the bottle.

items.title: Cookery Magic Singapore Peranakan/Nonya Cooking #1
items.headline: Learn how easy it is to cook Peranakan/Nonya recipes from Food Sorceress, Ruqxana, of Cookery Magic.
objectives_summary: Learn cooking techniques applicable to many Asian cuisines because Peranakan food is a blend of Chinese, Malay and Indian cooking.
Identify and have a sound understanding of Asian ingredients.
Learn how to prepare Asian ingredients from scratch.
